titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3616) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1999 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 1999, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-535, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3616 with 2 hours of general debate. The rule provides for general debate only. No further consideration of the bill shall be in order except pursuant to a subsequent order of the House.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 189.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/14/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3616 (Department of Defense authorization).
